movies.title: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose: The Forgotten Hero
movies.plot: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose: The Forgotten Hero (also known as Bose: The Forgotten Hero) is a 2005 film directed by Shyam Benegal and starring Sachin Khedekar, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Rajit Kapur, Arif Zakaria, and Divya Dutta. The movie depicts the last five years of the life of the Indian independence leader "Netaji" Subhash Chandra Bose. It starts out at the point where Bose resigns from his position as the president of the Indian National Congress (I.N.C.) to the meeting with Italians by crossing Afghanistan's rugged terrains and entering into Europe, to romancing his German secretary and appointment with Adolf Hitler in Berlin, to his inspiring of the Indian P.O.W.s (Prisoners Of War) of the 'Punjab Regiment' (British Army) for fighting against the British forces in India, to the patriotic speeches.

Subhas Chandra Bose arrives in Tokyo
Subhas Chandra Bose travels from Saigon to Tourane
Subhas Chandra Bose dies in a plane crash

movies.title: Victoria & Abdul
movies.plot: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 11 nominations.

events.title: Abdul Karim delivers a mohur gold coin to Queen Victoria

movies.title: A Mighty Heart
movies.plot: Based on Mariane Pearl's account of the terrifying and unforgettable story of her husband, Wall Street Journal reporter Danny Pearl's life and death.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 17 nominations.

movies.title: Black Friday
movies.plot: Bombs tear through Bombay, wreaking havoc and polarising the citizens. With perpetrators at large, the state launches a massive drive to unmask the truth behind these events.

events.title: Gul Mohammed confesses conspiracy to bomb several major targets
multiple bombs kill 257 people in Bombay
189 people are accused of being complicit in the Bombay bombings

movies.title: Shah
movies.plot: This film covers the story of this Legend's journey from homeless child in the streets of Layari,Karachi to become Olympian for his country PAKISTAN.

events.title: Hussain Shah wins bronze at the Olympics

movies.title: Ek Thi Marium
movies.plot: Marium Mukhtar (Sanam Baloch) achieves her dream of becoming a fighter pilot and becomes the first female flying officer of Pakistan to embrace martyrdom.

movies.title: The Attacks Of 26-11
movies.plot: The real-life story of eight Pakistani terrorists, who sail to Mumbai and wage war on the populace for the next 24 hours.

movies.title: Hotel Mumbai
movies.plot: Mumbai, India, November 26, 2008. While several terrorists spread hatred and death through the city, others attack the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel. Both hotel staff and guests risk their lives, making unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and keep everyone safe while help arrives.

events.title: terrorists begin attacking sites in Mumbai
